# ASError.Code.pickerAlreadyActive

**Case**

The picker received a show request when it was already active.

## Declaration

```swift
case pickerAlreadyActive
```

## Picker errors

- **ASError.Code.pickerRestricted**: The picker can’t be used because the app is in the background.

items.description: The picker can’t be used because the app is in the background.
